english.segment1: Lord you have my heart. And I will search for yours. Jesus take my life and lead me on.
english.segment2: Lord you have my heart. And I will search for yours. Let me be to you a sacrifice.
english.segment3: (men) And I will praise you Lord. (ladies) I will praise you Lord. (men) And I will sing of love come down. (ladies) I will sing of love come down. (men) And as you show your face. (ladies) Show your face. (together) We'll see your glory here.
